content.Title: Adding a Unique Key Column Using Magic ETL
content.Article Body:
There are times when you want to join DataSets together, however, there is no unique key column to join on. By using the
                        
                         Understanding Joins
                        
                        .
                       


                         To create a unique key column,
                        



                         Go into the
                         
                          edit view
                         
                         or
                         
                          create a new
                         
                         Magic ETL DataFlow.
                        


                          Add the
                          
                           Rank and Window
                          
                          tile to the canvas and connect it to your Input DataSet.
                          






                          In the configuration pane, click
                          
                           Add Function
                          
                          .
                         



                          Under step 1, name the new column.
                          






                          Select
                          
                           Row Number
                          
                          from the
                          
                           Select the function to apply
                          
                          dropdown.
                          






                          Click
                          
                           Apply
                          
                          .
                         



                          Under section 2, choose a column to sort your data on to determine how the rows numbers will be applied.
                         



                          Next, choose to order your column by either ascending or descending values.
                          






                          With the goal of having a unique key value for every row of your data, you will want to leave the
                          
                           What columns make up the partition
                          
                          option blank.
                         



                          Once your ETL has been completed and ran, the output will have the new column with a unique value for each row.
content.Primary Version: Adding a Unique Key Column Using Magic ETL

title: Adding a Unique Key Column Using Magic ETL
